name: High Efficiency Gas Water Heater
description: $75 discount on high efficiency gas water heater when replacing similar sized gas unit; can combine with federal incentives
fullDescription: For those not ready to switch to electric, Golden State Rebates offers a discount on high-efficiency gas water heaters at participating retailers.
whatTheyOffer:
- $75 instant discount at checkout
- No rebate forms to submit
- For high-efficiency gas models
- Must replace similar-sized gas unit
- Can combine with federal incentives
- Available at major home improvement stores
howToGetIt:
1. Find participating retailer on website
2. Shop for qualifying high-efficiency gas water heater
3. Discount applied automatically at checkout
4. Must replace existing gas unit of similar size
5. No paperwork required
6. Can stack with federal tax credits if applicable
